extension.description: Loads single lines of text from a predetermined text file to populate virtual keyboard in XBMC. I control XBMC by remote and I am sick of using the in-built, on-screen keyboard to type in long text strings. This service recognises when the virtual keyboard is open and reads in a line from a text file you select. If there are multiple lines in the text file, you can have the service cycle through them at a speed you determine.
